articles.title: Lionel Messi adds 'best men's player' to trophy haul at Best FIFA Awards in Paris
articles.description: Argentina star Lionel Messi took the men’s best player award at The Best FIFA Awards held in Paris after lifting the World Cup for the first time in December.
articles.content:
Argentina star Lionel Messi took the men’s best player award at The Best FIFA Awards held in Paris after lifting the World Cup for the first time in December.
The PSG and Argentina talisman beat France's Kylian Mbappe and Karim Benzema to the gong.

articles.description: The rivalry between Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo reached new heights as the Portuguese superstar fails to cast a vote for FIFA.
articles.content:
Published 02/28/2023, 12:04 AM EST

articles.title: Fishermen find remains of man inside shark
articles.description: The remains of a man who had disappeared in southern Argentina earlier this month appear to have been found inside a school shark that was captured by local fishermen.
articles.content:
The Associated Press
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — The remains of a man who had disappeared in southern Argentina earlier this month appear to have been found inside a school shark that was captured by local fishermen.

articles.title: Lionel Messi Wins FIFA The Best Player Award, Alexia Putellas Claims Women's Prize
articles.description: Lionel Messi was named FIFA player of the year 2022 on Monday as Argentina scooped all major men's awards after winning the FIFA World Cup last December
articles.content:
Lionel Messi won The Best FIFA men’s player prize for 2022 on Monday on the back of his World Cup triumph with Argentina as his national teammates won the other men’s awards. Spain’s Alexia Putellas retained the women’s award at a ceremony in Paris.

articles.title: Lionel Messi wins FIFA Best Men's Player award on great night for Argentina as well as Sarina Wiegman and England Women's stars in Paris star-studded event
articles.description: In perhaps one of the least surprising bits of news you'll hear all year, Lionel Messi has won the FIFA Best Men's Player award.It's been a memorable
articles.content:
In perhaps one of the least surprising bits of news you’ll hear all year, Lionel Messi has won the FIFA Best Men’s Player award.

articles.title: Lionel Messi wins Best FIFA Men's Player award as USWNT star Alex Morgan misses out on best women's player
articles.description: Argentina national team manager Lionel Scaloni also won for men's coach
articles.content: The Best FIFA Football awards took place in Paris on Monday night and as expected, Lionel Messi took home Best FIFA Men's Player honors after leading his national team to World Cup glory in December. He beat out two French players, PSG teammate Kylia... [2759 chars]
